resources.displayName: Get existing incidents

params.name: since
params.displayName: Start of the date range over which you want to search

params.name: until
params.displayName: End of the date range over which you want to search

params.name: date_range
params.displayName: Use this to get all incidents since the account was created

params.name: fields
params.displayName: Used to restrict the properties of each incident returned to a set of pre-defined fields

params.name: status
params.displayName: Returns only the incidents currently in the passed status(es)

params.name: incident_key
params.displayName: Returns only the incidents with the passed de-duplication key

params.name: service
params.displayName: Returns only the incidents associated with the passed service(s)

params.name: teams
params.displayName: A comma-separated list of team IDs, specifying teams whose maintenance windows will be returned

params.name: assigned_to_user
params.displayName: Returns only the incidents currently assigned to the passed user(s)

params.name: urgency
params.displayName: List of the urgencies of the incidents to be returned

params.name: time_zone
params.displayName: Time zone in which dates in the result will be rendered (defaults to UTC)

resources.displayName: Get detailed info about an incident

params.name: :id
params.displayName: Accepts incident id or an incident number

resources.displayName: Get a count of the number of incidents matching certain criteria

params.name: since
params.displayName: Start of the date range over which you want to search

params.name: until
params.displayName: End of the date range over which you want to search

params.name: date_range
params.displayName: Use this to get all counts since the account was created

params.name: status
params.displayName: Counts the incidents currently in the passed status(es)

params.name: incident_key
params.displayName: Only counts the incidents with the passed de-duplication key

params.name: service
params.displayName: Only counts the incidents associated with the passed service(s)

params.name: teams
params.displayName: Team IDs, specifying teams whose maintenance windows will be returned

params.name: assigned_to_user
params.displayName: Only count incidents with statuses of triggered or acknowledged
